unified_fields.name: variant_id
unified_fields.description: Unique identifier for the variant record
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Primary key for variant identification across databases

unified_fields.name: variant_type
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Sequence Ontology term for variant type

unified_fields.name: hgvs_expression
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Human Genome Variation Society standardized notation

unified_fields.name: allele_frequency
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Proportion of alternate allele in population (0-1)

unified_fields.name: recommendation
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Dosing guidance or alternative therapy recommendation

unified_fields.name: gene_id
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Ensembl gene ID or HGNC symbol

unified_fields.name: cancer_type
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Cancer type or tissue of origin

Cancer Gene Census.name: Mutation Types
Cancer Gene Census.description: Mutation type codes (Mis, N, F, S, D, T, A)

genomic_coordinates.description: Core genomic variant coordinates shared across variant and expression databases

gene_identifiers.description: Gene identification shared across all genomics databases

clinical_significance.description: Variant pathogenicity classifications from clinical and cancer databases

population_frequency.description: Population genetics metrics shared between functional prediction and population genetics databases
